p: The different EAF5 fractions (EAF5-1–EAF5-5) were collected through TLC analysis (Supplementary Figure S3). MTT assay showed that the optimal concentration was 25 μg/ml for cell survival of EAF5 subfractions (Supplementary Figure S4). The EAF5-5 fraction significantly increased fluorescence intensity of hepatocytes (108.4 ± 7.7%), compared with the TNF- α-induced IR group ( P < 0.05; Figure 3).
